column4: so I plugged in my USB stick like usual.. and it says it cannot be mounted because I don't have the privledges to do so.. I could mount it manually from the terminal but I don't know what it's path is
Can anyone give me a quick command to do so? It takes forever to load the hardware information thingy
I would rather have a quick terminal command
first i have to know the drive, to do so type fdisk -l
